code: import{CHANGE_SEARCH_FIELD,REQUEST_CATS_PENDING,REQUEST_CATS_SUCCESS,REQUEST_CATS_FAILED}from'./constants.js';var initialStateSearch={searchField:''};export var searchCats=function searchCats(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialStateSearch;var action=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};switch(action.type){case CHANGE_SEARCH_FIELD:return Object.assign({},state,{searchField:action.payload});default:return state;}};var initialStateCats={isPending:false,cats:[],error:''};export var requestCats=function requestCats(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialStateCats;var action=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};switch(action.type){case REQUEST_CATS_PENDING:return Object.assign({},state,{isPending:true});case REQUEST_CATS_SUCCESS:return Object.assign({},state,{cats:action.payload,isPending:false});case REQUEST_CATS_FAILED:return Object.assign({},state,{error:action.payload,isPending:false});default:return state;}};
